descriptionProfile: Fresh way to eat healthy and feel amazing! Daily Vegan Recipes | Lifestyle | Travel 📧 hello@tropicallylina.com NEW SITE + Mermaid Nicecream Recipe ⇙
Fresh way to eat healthy and feel amazing! Daily Vegan Recipes | Lifestyle | Travel 📧 hello@tropicallylina.com NEW SITE + Mermaid Nicecream Recipe ⇙

posts.description: MERMAID NICECREAM Recipe is now live on my new blog 🙌🏼🐳🌊 which I'm so excited to share with you all! (link in my bio) ★ Quick question for you guys: do you like the new name? I'm thinking of changing it here on IG too so that I'm 'Tropically Lina' on all social platforms. I'm currently 'Tropically Lina' on: Facebook, Tumblr and Twitter. 🤔I'm just thinking if I should change it here too or leave it 'linasaber' here. The content will of course continue to be the same. 👌🏼 Let me know your thoughts below, I'd love to hear them! 😊

Oh you know just Mermaid Nicecreamin' 🐚🐳🌊🍦 would ya like a scoop? ☺️ Sharing this nourishing, banana-free with a coconut substitute @nicecream on my blog release tomorrow at 9PM. Seriously can't wait to share all the details of the Mermaid Smoothie Bowl and Mermaid Nicecream. The last of the blue theme to celebrate my blog launch! 💙

The taste of the ocean continues with these Frothy Bubble Teas 🌊☁️🐳🍃🍶 made with brewed white tea leaves, warmed almond coconut milk, maple syrup, a pinch of blue majik and frozen blueberries at the base. 👌🏼
Will be sharing the complete deets for this on my new site, coming shortly. Had this for breakfast with some fluffy pancakes this morning! So obsessed with how this flavor turned out.💙

Ocean Reefs Inspired Smoothie Bowl 🌊🥝🐠💦 with the freckled trio 😌 kiwifruit balls and dehydrated coconut cubes. For the base I blended 2 frozen bananas, a scoop of blue majik spirulina, 1/2 tsp of green algae and 1 chilled and peeled kiwifruit. So replenishing thanks to all the organic ingredients from Mother Nature! 🙏🏼🌏🌴

Water is my element, what's yours? 💧 I drift to this place to meditate and it's where I feel most serene 🌊✨💆🏻
I really don't know why it is that all of us are so committed to the sea, except I think it's because in addition to the fact that the sea changes, and the light changes, and ships change, it's because we all came from the sea. And it is an interesting biological fact that all of us have in our veins the exact same percentage of salt in our blood that exists in the ocean, and, therefore, we have salt in our blood, in our sweat, in our tears. We are tied to the ocean. And when we go back to the sea, whether it is to sail or to watch it, we are going back from whence we came." - John F. Kennedy
📸 In South Beach, Miami's  turquoise waters. #happyearthday #whpnaturalbeauty

Heavenly ‘Banilla’ Nicecream for the weekend 🕊🍦☁️ So nourishing and dairy free, as always! Made this with fro nanas, coco cream and vanilla extract. 👌🏼 I’ve shared the recipe for this one below.
🌟 Rad lil’ tip: If you don’t like the taste of coconut milk I find an awesome substitute is overnight-soaked cashews in equal amount and replace the coconut cream with a teaspoon of organic guar gum powder! It still tastes just as creamy and so delicious!

Captured a piece of the ocean and whipped up a lush nourishing @nicecream 🌊🐬🍦The details for this one and the mermaid bowl will be the first released on my new site coming in three days! Can't wait to release it! I'll be answering what coconut cream, blue spirulina, and blender I use and more! Happy Friday! 🙌🏼

Mermaid Layered Delights 🐚🐳🌊💎 would ya like one? 😌 Made these with a mix of frozen coconut meat, green algae and blue majik spirulina. Layered it with hemp milk chia pudding and topped it off with thick coconut cream, frozen blueberries and mini dragon balls. ✔️ This one's loaded with rad health benefits thanks to all algae and chia seeds. 👌🏻This was breakfast for two!

Ocean-inspired Smoothie Bowl 🌊💦🐳with my freckled trio 😌 frozen bluebs and dehydrated coconut cubes. For the base I blended 2 frozen bananas, a scoop of blue majik spirulina, 1 heaping tablespoon of coconut cream (thick version of coconut milk) until creamy! All my smoothie bowls are free from artificial colors and flavours. Just oh so healthy and rejuvenating!

Frothy 🌊✨ Who doesn't love the sea? It's a place of healing and joy. The salt cleanses us and the sun embraces us in its warmth. The ocean heals the heart, mind, and soul. It has some potent power to make us think things we like to think.
P.s- I'm slightly obsessed with shooting waves 😌 Hope to learn to surf some baby waves soon, when I move! 📸 Shot this one in South Beach Miami at a time when most were kite surfing 🏄‍♀️
